videoGames.title: ELDEN RING
videoGames.description: Elden Ring is an action role-playing game set in third-person perspective. It includes elements that are similar to those in other FromSoftware-developed games, such as the Dark Souls series, Bloodborne, and Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice.

videoGames.title: ARK
videoGames.description: Players can use firearms and improvised weapons to defend against hostile humans and creatures, with the ability to build bases as a defense on the ground and on some creatures.

videoGames.title: FAR CRY 6
videoGames.description: Similar to the previous entries in the series, Far Cry 6 is a first-person shooter game, set in an open world environment navigable on foot or via various land, water, and air vehicles.

videoGames.title: Stardew Valley
videoGames.description: Stardew Valley is a 2016 farm life simulation role-playing video game developed by Eric Barone. Players take the role of a character who inherits their deceased grandfather's dilapidated farm in a place known as Stardew Valley.

videoGames.title: EA Sports FC24
videoGames.description: EA SPORTS FC™ 24 welcomes you to The World’s Game: the most true-to-football experience ever with HyperMotionV, PlayStyles optimised by Opta, and an enhanced Frostbite™ Engine.

videoGames.title: Metro Exodus
videoGames.description: Like earlier games in the series, Metro Exodus is a first-person shooter. The player controls player-character Artyom, who must leave the tunnels of Moscow and travel across the post-apocalyptic wasteland of the former Russian Federation and Republic of Kazakhstan while fighting against mutated creatures and hostile humans.

videoGames.title: Hollow Knight
videoGames.description: Hollow Knight is a 2D side-scrolling Metroidvania. The player controls a silent insectoid protagonist called the Knight who explores an underground fallen kingdom called Hallownest.

videoGames.title: Tomb Rider
videoGames.description: Players take control of the series lead character Lara Croft. The game uses an interconnected hub-and-spoke model that combines action-adventure, exploration, and survival elements.
